projects.description: Add rich data to the website
userStories: *As user*, I can share website link with additional open graph description
*As crawler*, I can see rich data script providing basic information about the website

added: Rich data meta: JSON-LD script, open graph and twitter card details. Can be tested [here](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool) and [here](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/).
Logo in the topbar instead of text

projects.description: Build Lapchart - stopwatch with visualisation chart
userStories: *As user*, I measure laps usign lapchart app
*As user*, I can use Lapchart app offline and save it to home screen as standalone app
*As user*, I can see visualization chart after I hit Stop button
*As user*, I can see my best and worst lap

added: Project type cards with links to the project live demo and source code

projects.description: Convert to PWA, introduce topbar and footer and prepare layout for navigation and routing
userStories: *As user*, I can use website offline
*As user*, I can use save website to home screen and use it as standalone app
*As user*, I can use website on small screens with up to 272px minimum viewport width
*As user*, I can see the ways to contact @snigo
*As @snigo*, I can start developing, uploading and showcasing projects as of tomorrow

added: Markdown support for user stories and changelog tabs
Animation for details section of the task card (Work in progress)
changed: Color contrast of interactive elements was increassed to comply with WCAG recomendations
fixed: Minor fixes for smaller screens and bottom margin
Word wrapping issue with long urls in the changelog

projects.description: Automate changelog, make a proper day task card and fix responsiveness
userStories: *As user*, I can use website on every modern device and screen size
*As user*, I can see daily task, user stories and change log, as well as technologies used
*As user*, I can go to each day's release and compare logs from website, as well as from [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/snigo/snigo-dev/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) on github
*As @snigo*, I never have to change both relative and absolute dates for the challenges

added: Pre-push git hook that bumps version and updates changelog prior to deployment
Script that automatically changes relative day of the challenge
Changelog and user stories tabs for the task card
changed: Day task is switched from dummy to reusable component
